divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend were driving home from Jbox and there was a pink orb looking light hovering over Bothell Everett HWY we opened the windows and it was not making any sound it was just hovering in little circles above us then shot away north bound.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Bothell
There were no other sightings in Bothell on or around July 10th 2012
